title: Corinthia Hotels premiere at IMEX American 2015
text:
Corinthia Hotels premiere at IMEX American 2015   Dale Scharlat, Head of MICE & Group Sales (North America) for Corinthia Hotels   
Corinthia Hotels, the internationally-renowned brand of luxury hotels, will attend IMEX America for the first time this year, October 13-15, 2015, to showcase its outstanding “Events at Corinthia” program and recent upgrades to its MICE facilities and initiatives across the portfolio. The five-star Corinthia properties in London, Budapest, St Petersburg, Prague and Lisbon will be represented at the Las Vegas trade show, at Booth 1957. 
Dale Scharlat, Head of MICE & Group Sales for Corinthia Hotels since 2013, and the primary MICE sales contact for the North America region, will be taking appointments during IMEX. Dale is based in New York and works closely with her European colleagues to drive brand recognition and sales in the American group and MICE market. She was previously Director of Group Sales (North America) with Concorde Hotels & Resorts and has over 20 years of industry experience with strong background in Global Sales. To contact Dale, please email . 
Headline MICE Initiatives from Corinthia Hotels 2015 
Corinthia Hotels, the internationally renowned collection of luxury hotels, launched “Food for Thought,” a range of new healthy eating options for MICE planners and their business travelers, aimed at keeping them physically healthy and mentally focused, developed in collaboration with a leading Nutritional Therapist, Jeannette Hyde. Each of the nine Corinthia hotels offers their own unique Food for Thought menu based on fresh and locally-sourced ingredients. The menus have been designed by Corinthia chefs and expert nutritionist Jeannette Hyde, who is a degree-qualified Nutritional Therapist trained in Functional Medicine. (May 2015) 
Corinthia Hotels launched a dedicated Meetings app aimed at event organizers and their delegates, ensuring the ultimate in personalized connectivity throughout corporate events at Corinthia. Easily downloadable and instantly updateable, it is the ideal way for event organizers to stay in touch with their delegates, inform them of last-minute meeting changes and any upcoming activities, using the dedicated My Meetings section of the app. The app’s features also include information about the hotels, an overview of Corinthia Offers and a “Book My Room” reservation feature. The app, named “Corinthia Hotels,” is free and available on iOS and Android. (May 2015) 
The award-winning Corinthia Hotel Budapest launches its brand-new Royal Lounge, Hungary’s first lounge dedicated to organizers of MICE events among its 5-star hotels. Reserved exclusively for event organizers and meeting participants, The Royal Salon will feature offices, boardrooms and rest areas, all fitted with 21st-century equipment. The Lounge will greatly enhance the comfort and convenience of event organizers, as well as the efficiency of organizational work, and its proximity to the hotel’s Events Team offices promises easy and direct contact with the hotel’s staff. (September 2015) 
Corinthia Hotel Prague, leading MICE hotel in the Czech Republic, continues its drive to be the best, having successfully completed its ambitious €250,000 ($279,742)-project to upgrade the hotel’s meetings and events audio-visual infrastructure . Highlights include a first of its kind in Prague 4.54 X 2.55 M SI BLACK screen to absorb ambient light, information Touch Multimedia kiosks (pictured), state of the art screens and projectors in main meeting spaces, and brand-new sound systems and lighting rigs. Corinthia Prague was further awarded Czech Republic’s Leading Business Hotel at the 2015 World Travel Awards. (February 2015) 
The five-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon has been awarded both Europe's Leading Green Hotel and Portugal's Leading Conference Hotel at the 2015 World Travel Awards, held in Sardinia, Italy. These awards recognize the hotel’s outstanding energy efficiency hotel project as well as for its world-class business facilities and service. (September 2015) 
“The group and MICE sector is of utmost importance to Corinthia Hotels, especially as most properties feature extensive conference facilities and a suitable number of guestrooms to support large-scale events. The North American market is growing and Corinthia is poised to gain market share as companies continue to grow their global reach and bring employees together. It has been exciting to witness increased brand awareness and marked results in my time with Corinthia, and I look forward to great success in 2016 and beyond,” said Dale Scharlat, Head of MICE & Group Sales for Corinthia Hotels. 
For further information on Corinthia Hotels, please click here . 
About Corinthia Hotel 
Corinthia is a collection of five-star hotels founded by the Pisani family of Malta. Established in 1968, the group is a family-inspired business, with family values underpinning the Spirit of Corinthia. As a hotel business, Corinthia’s focus is on giving honest, discreet service. Authenticity, passion, precision and understanding are Corinthia’s guiding principles, ensuring they are true craftsmen in the world of hospitality. Each of the hotels and resorts, in some of the most exciting places in the world, are a tribute to local architecture and cultural traditions. The Corinthia portfolio includes the flagship Corinthia Hotel in London, as well as award-winning Corinthia Hotels in Budapest, Malta, St Petersburg, Prague, Lisbon, Khartoum and Tripoli. Corinthia Hotels is owned by International Hotel Investments (IHI), a publicly-traded company in Malta. CHI Hotels & Resorts Limited is a wholly-owned member of the IHI Group which manages Corinthia Hotels.
